Welcome to the Royal Kingdom of Colchis

About the Kingdom

The Royal Kingdom of Colchis is known for its advanced technological development but also for its military prowess. This website is here to let you discover all of our prestigious information, but also to find good locations to visit if you ever want to come for your vacations.
